comments.content:
Hey guys, trying to find the script font on this logo .... Or something very similar.  
Thanks !

No exact match.  
Here are a couple with similar capital \_A\_ that could substitute if thickened:  
Filmotype Leader

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150220004539im_/http:/typophile.com/files/FilmotypeLeaderAsAloha_5643.gif)
  
 [https://www.myfonts.com/fonts/filmotype/filmotype-leader/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150220004539/https:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/filmotype/filmotype-leader/ "https://www.myfonts.com/fonts/filmotype/filmotype-leader/")  
Big Brush  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150220004539im_/http:/typophile.com/files/BigBrushAsAloha_4722.gif)
  
 [https://www.myfonts.com/fonts/canadatype/big-brush/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150220004539/https:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/canadatype/big-brush/ "https://www.myfonts.com/fonts/canadatype/big-brush/")  
Don
